alert.note: Alert for Southern Berkshire (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 09 at 3:27AM EST until November 09 at 10:00AM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation. Additional snow accumulations of less than one inch and ice accumulations of around one tenth of an inch. * WHERE...The Mohawk and Schoharie Valleys, eastern Catskills, Herkimer County, northern Fulton County, southern Saratoga County, southern Washington County, northern Rensselaer County and southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Until 10 AM EST this morning. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions, especially on untreated and elevated surfaces. The hazardous conditions could impact the morning commute. Some power outages are possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Mixed precipitation will transition to freezing rain early this morning. Freezing rain will then change to plain rain by later this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
